attributes.action: World Health Organisations to reverse the appointment of Robert Mugabe
attributes.background: Robert Mugabe has destroyed the public heath sector, Zimbabweans are destitute, suffer human rights violations, hospitals & clinics in crisis. 95% unemployment, 2-3 million living in the diaspora,  Violent partisan military & police force, corrupt to the core, ZANU leaders are under sanctions.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for.

In any case, this has already happened:
http://www.who.int/mediacentre/news/statements/2017/goodwill-ambassador-rescinded/en/
